conbody.p: Rejected records are transferred reliably in both directions, meaning that there is no data loss or duplication in case of node failure. The generation of duplicates is prevented using per-file and per-record locks, which are stored in the database. If a stream holding a lock fails, the lock will expire after the timeout specified by the node parameter SFTPFileTTLInProgress. After the lock has expired, the unprocessed records in the file are processed again.
